UPCOMINGBRUNCH EVENTS

Come hang out with us at one of our upcoming events!

Return Of
The Drag
Legacy Hall -- 4/3/22
Drag brunches are BACK at Legacy Hall with crazy cocktails, delicious brunch and live entertainment.

Indulge in specialty brunch items and themed cocktails available at this event ONLY. While you indulge in brunch, an all-star cast of queens will move throughout the floor to put on an unforgettable show.

After the show, enjoy a free Meet-N-Greet with the queens themselves for the perfect Instagrammable moment!
